Module diabetesKnight
Package item

Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
item.Item
item.Weapon
Direct Known Subclasses:
MeleeWeapon, RangedWeapon
public abstract class Weapon extends Item
Weapon Represents a weapon in the game A weapon is an item that can be used to attack

      Parameters:
      gc - the graphics context of the canvas
      x - the x coordinate of the weapon
      y - the y coordinate of the weapon
      width - the width of the weapon
      height - the height of the weapon
      isFacingLeft - whether the entity who is holding the weapon is facing left
